title: Paul Scheer on Beverly Hills Cop
itunes:title: Paul Scheer on Beverly Hills Cop
description:
Paul Scheer is known for his great work on shows like The League and Children's Hospital, and for his movie podcasts, How Did This Get Made and Unspooled. Listen in today and he and Chuck talk acting, comedy, the early days of UCB, and Paul's movie crush, Beverly Hills Cop. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
